Purposes for which the spiritual life is: May deeds to be experienced in this life be experienced by me in lives to come
May deeds to be experienced in lives to come be experienced by me in this life
May deeds to be experienced as pleasant be experienced by me as painful
May deeds to be experienced as painful be experienced by me as pleasant
May deeds to be experienced when ripe be experienced by me when unripe
May deeds to be experienced when unripe be experienced by me when ripe
May deeds to be experienced a lot be experienced by me a little
May deeds to be experienced a little be experienced by me a lot
May deeds to be experienced by me be not experienced
May deeds not to be experienced be experienced
The unknown, unseen, unattained, unreali: This is the origin of suffering
This is the cessation of suffering
This is the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering
